Clear.label: Clear Chat
Clear.tooltip: Be quick to remove profanity and insults from screen

Freedom.label: Freedom Of Speech
Freedom.tooltip: When checked all chat will be translated to overlay with no cost and cooldowns

Bttv.label: BTTV Emotes
Bttv.tooltip: When checked Better TwitchTV and FrankerFaceZ emotes will be displayed

Direction.label: Scroll direction
Direction.tooltip: Direction in which chat messages are scrolled

Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

Response.label: Response
Response.tooltip: Optional message that will be sent to chat when using the command.

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

Cost.label: Command cost
Cost.tooltip: Cost of commands in channel points

Info.label: Info
Info.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

CooldownUser.label: User cooldown (seconds)
CooldownUser.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for the same user

CooldownGlobal.label: Global cooldown (seconds)
CooldownGlobal.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for all users

CooldownResponse.label: Cooldown Response
CooldownResponse.tooltip: Optional response message if command is in cooldown

BadWords.label: Bad words
BadWords.tooltip: Put here the bad words you want to filter out. Comma separated, e.g.: another,bad,word

ChannelId.label: Channel Id
ChannelId.tooltip: Speeds up fetching channel badges and bttv emotes
